From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To modify the diagnostic event log size dynamically, use the **diagnostic event-log size** command in global configuration mode. To return to the default settings, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: Diagnostic event-log sizes. The valid values range from 1 to 10000Â entries.

Examples: The following example shows how to set the diagnostic event-log <size>:
ExtraInfo: The events are dynamically allocated and stored in a circular queue.You can enter either the **default** **diagnostic event-log size** command or the **no** **diagnostic event-log size** command to return to the default settings.

RelatedCmds.description: Displays the event log for the diagnostic events.
